}, "$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/mark-dropdown": { "text": "\\define toolbar-button-mark-inner()\n<$button tag=\"a\">\n\n<$action-sendmessage\n\t$message=\"tm-edit-text-operation\"\n\t$param=\"wrap-selection\"\n\tprefix={{$(snippetTitle)$}}\n\tsuffix=\"@@\"\n/>\n\n<$action-deletetiddler\n\t$tiddler=<>\n/>\n\n<$view tiddler=<> field=\"caption\" mode=\"inline\">\n\n<$view tiddler=<> field=\"title\" mode=\"inline\"/>\n\n\n\n\n\\end\n\n<$list filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TextEditor/Marklet]!has[draft.of]sort[caption]]\" variable=\"snippetTitle\">\n\n<>\n\n\n\n----\n\n<$button tag=\"a\">\n\n<$action-sendmessage\n\t$message=\"tm-new-tiddler\"\n\ttags=\"$:/tags/TextEditor/Marklet\"\n\tcaption={{$:/language/Buttons/Mark/New/Title}}\n\ttext={{$:/language/Buttons/Mark/New/Text}}\n/>\n\n<$action-deletetiddler\n\t$tiddler=<>\n/>\n\n\n\n<$text "text": "Add your own", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/Mark/Caption/New", "tags": "", "modified": "20180201203825341", "created": "20180201203813638" }, "$:/language/Buttons/Mark/New/Text": { "created": "20180201203941132", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "\n* The only thing you have to add here is a CSS class prefixed by `@@`, e.g: `@@.xyz ` (note the extra space at the end)\n** The closing `@@` will be added automatically upon applying the 'mark'.\n* Define the class in $:/plugins/tg/mark-button/styles, e.g. `.xyx {color: Purple;}`\n* Add a descriptive title in the caption field of this tiddler, e.g. 'Text color Purple'\n* Add an appropriate title to this tiddler\n* Save this tiddler\n** Remove this help text before saving!\n", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/Mark/New/Text", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221229122558346" }, "$:/language/Buttons/Mark/New/Title": { "text": "Name as shown in menu", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/Mark/New/Title", "tags": "", "modified": "20180201204039961", "created": "20180201204029720" }, "$:/language/Marklets/Highlight-lightcyan": { "text": "@@.tglc ", "title": "$:/language/Marklets/Highlight-lightcyan", "tags": "$:/tags/TextEditor/Marklet", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20201003193655469", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20191230202243900", "caption": "Highlight LightCyan" }, "$:/plugins/tg/mark-button/readme": { "created": "20180203172237667", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "\\define icn(icon)\n\n\\end\n\nA button (<>) that applies coloring / highlighting to the selected text
\nAssigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/mark}}\n\n''Note'': $:/plugins/tg/mark-button/styles contains the applied 'mark' classes:\n\n|Class |CSS ||h\n|`tgc` |`@@background-color:Cyan;`|@@.tgc text@@|\n|`tglc` |`@@background-color:LightCyan;`|@@.tglc text@@|\n|`tgy` |`@@background-color:Yellow;`|@@.tgy text@@|\n|`tgb` |`@@color:Blue;`|@@.tgb text@@|\n|`tgr` |`@@color:Red;`|@@.tgr text@@|\n|`tgwr` |`@@color:White;background-color:Red;`|@@.tgwr text@@|\n\nYou can add new entries via 'Add your own' in the dropdown menu.\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/mark-button/readme", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20230827110045185" }, "$:/plugins/tg/mark-button/styles": { "text": "/* Standard yellow highlight */\n.tgy {\n background-color:Yellow;\n}\n/* Background color Cyan */\n.tgc {\n background-color:Cyan;\n}\n/* Background color LightCyan */\n.tglc {\n background-color:LightCyan;\n}\n/* Text color red */\n.tgr {\n color:Red;\n}\n/* Text color blue */\n.tgb {\n color:Blue;\n}\n/* White text on red background */\n.tgwr {\n color:White;background-color:Red;\n}\n/* Purple text */\n.tgp {\n color: Purple;\n}", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/mark-button/styles", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20201003201624167", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20201002175020323" }, "$:/plugins/tg/mark-button/license": { "created": "20210104195504296", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "[[Mark button|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2023\n\nMIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/mark-button/license", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221229122045392" } } }
